markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=1534)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 332 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=23)

**Deity**
[Sky Keepers](/Deities.aspx?ID=232)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The duration increases to 1 hour.
name: Fly
